title: The Keeper of the Bees
cast_members: Robert Frazer|Josef Swickard|Martha Mattox|Clara Bow|Alyce Mills|Gene Stratton|Joe Coppa|Ainse Charland|Billy Osborne

media.title: The Keeper of the Bees (1925) - 1.jpg
media.caption: Advertisement for the American drama film The Keeper of the Bees (1925) with author Gene Stratton Porter, on pages 66 and 67 of the May 23, 1925 Exhibitors Herald.
media.attribution: Gene Stratton Porter Productions / Film Booking Offices of America

media.title: The Keeper of the Bees (1925) - 10.jpg
media.caption: Still from the American drama film The Keeper of the Bees (1925) with Alyce Mills, on page 71 of the December 19, 1925 Exhibitors Herald.
media.attribution: Gene Stratton Porter Productions / Film Booking Offices of America

media.title: The Keeper of the Bees (1925) - 5.jpg
media.caption: Still from the American drama film The Keeper of the Bees (1925) with Alyce Mills and Robert Frazer, on page 91 of the August 1, 1925 Exhibitors Herald.

media.title: The Keeper of the Bees (1925) - 8.jpg
media.caption: Still from the American drama film The Keeper of the Bees (1925), on page 91 of the October 17, 1925 Exhibitors Herald.

media.title: The Keeper of the Bees (1925) - 2.jpg
media.caption: Still from the American drama film The Keeper of the Bees (1925) with Gene Stratton-Porter Monroe (1914 – 1966), credited in the film as Gene Stratton and granddaughter of author Gene Stratton Porter, on page 66 of the June 27, 1925 Exhibitors Herald. She played "Little Scout" in the film.
media.attribution: Gene Stratton Porter Productions / Film Booking Offices of America
